text: Ezɨ atrivim izima, akam inigha izir gumazim an diagha ghaze, “Atrivim, kɨ mɨdorozir ekiamɨn aven itima, en mɨdorozir gumazir mam, apanir mam inigha iza na mɨgɨa ghaze, ‘Nɨ deraghvɨra gumazir kamɨn gan. An arɨmangɨghtɨ, kɨ nɨ mɨsueghtɨ nɨ aremegham. Puvatɨghtɨma, kɨ nɨ damutɨ, nɨ 30,000plan kina isɨ uan ikɨrɨmɨrim uam a givezam.’ Mɨdorozir gumazir kam na mɨkemegha ghu.
